name: Ice-Sealed Crimson Witch of Embers
description:
When the Action Phase starts: If the attached character has no more than 15 HP, remove this effect.
When attached character is defeated: Remove this effect, ensure that character will not be defeated and heal them to 1 HP.

When this effect is removed: Attached character will transform into the Crimson Witch of Embers state.
